pages.text: You may have noticed that the latent magicks here cause your equipment to be imbued with various traits; some of which are helpful, while others are hindrances. Dealing with such hindrances is a nuisance, but fortunately, mages past saw fit to stash $(item)Reforging Tokens$() in various places.

These unusual tokens can be looted from $(thing)Nether Fortresses$(), and $(thing)Dungeon Raids$(). Once obtained, you can use them in a $(item)Reforging Station$() to change the trait of the weapon, armor or bauble you choose.
Can also be looted from $(thing)Dungeon Raids$()
